text: NEW: @HouseJudiciary member @tedlieu says House Dems sent document preservation letters to the Justice Department: "We want to make sure that nothing from the Mueller investigation is destroyed. It must be preserved in case congressional committees want to have access to it."
author: GeoffRBennett

text: NEW: Attorney General William Barr will not be submitting a summary of his findings to Congress today, per a senior DOJ official, who adds that "he and Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein are working closely together." - h/t @JuliaEAinsley
author: GeoffRBennett

text: BREAKING: A DOJ official tells NBC's Pete Williams and @JuliaEAinsley that AG Barr will not brief lawmakers today on the Mueller report's principal conclusions.
author: GeoffRBennett

text: Absolutely. We checked into the Biden/Abrams idea after a (non-campaign) source close to Biden floated it last weekend. We ultimately chose not to report it.
author: GeoffRBennett

text: NEW: The special counsel’s office will not be filing any indictments from here on out, @Tom_Winter reports, citing a senior U.S. law enforcement official.
author: GeoffRBennett

text: Biden’s former spokesman officially knocks down the notion of a pre-baked @JoeBiden / @staceyabrams ticket:
author: GeoffRBennett

text: THREAD
author: GeoffRBennett

text:
BREAKING: NBC News reports Attorney General William Barr has received Special Counsel Robert Mueller’s report.

The investigation is over.
author: GeoffRBennett

text: We’ve been hearing this same rumor from people close to Joe Biden, but sources at the highest level of Biden’s political operation tell @mikememoli that there’s no truth to it.
author: GeoffRBennett

text: .@Facebook, in statement, says it temporarily blocked @Scavino45 because it thought he was a bot.
author: GeoffRBennett

text: Trump in the Oval Office responding to @kwelkernbc about why he continues to attack the late Sen. John McCain: "I was never a fan of John McCain and never will be."
author: GeoffRBennett

text: NEW: @BetoORourke says he raised a record-breaking $6.1 million in online contributions from every state and territory during the first 24 hours of his presidential campaign. That number edges out @BernieSanders' $5.9 million haul during his initial 24-hour period
author: GeoffRBennett

text: Bill Goines made history by becoming the first black Navy SEAL. Now the 82-year-old is on a new mission – encouraging students of color to consider careers in the military’s special forces. My story for @NBCNightlyNews:
author: GeoffRBennett

text: After the New Zealand shootings, Trump downplayed the white nationalist threat. But experts say it's growing.
author: GeoffRBennett

text: .@realDonaldTrump & @FLOTUS are attending service this morning at St. John’s Episcopal Church near the White House. Barron did not accompany. - per WH pool
author: GeoffRBennett

text: Between 2008 and 2016, far-right plots and attacks outnumbered those by Muslim extremists by almost 2 to 1 -- according to data compiled by @TypeMediaCenter 5/5
author: GeoffRBennett

text: 71 percent of the deaths linked to extremism in the United States between 2008 and 2017 were committed by far-right attackers, according to @ADL 4/5
author: GeoffRBennett

text: The number of hate groups operating across America rose to a record high – 1,020 – in 2018, according to @splcenter 3/5
author: GeoffRBennett

text: .@FBI and @DHSgov -- in a May 2017 bulletin -- warned that white supremacist groups had already carried out more attacks than any other domestic extremist group over the past 16 years and were likely to carry out more. 2/5
author: GeoffRBennett

text: .@realDonaldTrump says he doesn't see a rise in white nationalism -- contradicting warnings from his own administration as well as independent groups. 1/5
author: GeoffRBennett

text: President Trump -- while condemning the New Zealand attacks -- downplayed the threat posed by the kinds of white nationalists who are suspected of being involved. My story for @TODAYshow
author: GeoffRBennett
